level.heading: Severability.
level.text: If any provision of this part is for any reason held invalid by any court of competent jurisdiction, the provision shall be deemed a separate, distinct, and independent provision, and its invalidity shall not affect the validity of the remaining provisions.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: D.C. Law 19-171 enacted this subchapter into law.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 3-98
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 3-98, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-2885.01.
